00033 CellMutationStateRegistry* CellMutationStateRegistry::mpInstance = NULL;

00035 CellMutationStateRegistry* CellMutationStateRegistry::Instance()
00036 {
00037     if (mpInstance == NULL)
00038     {
00039         mpInstance = new CellMutationStateRegistry;
00040     }
00041     return mpInstance;
00042 }

00044 const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellMutationState> >& CellMutationStateRegistry::rGetAllMutationStates()
00045 {
00046     return mMutationStates;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void CellMutationStateRegistry::Clear()
00050 {
00051     mMutationStates.clear();
00052     mOrderingHasBeenSpecified = false;
00053 }
00054 
00055 CellMutationStateRegistry::CellMutationStateRegistry()
00056     : mOrderingHasBeenSpecified(false)
00057 {
00058 }

00061 CellMutationStateRegistry* CellMutationStateRegistry::TakeOwnership()
00062 {
00063     mpInstance = NULL;
00064     return this;
00065 }

00067 void CellMutationStateRegistry::SpecifyOrdering(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellMutationState> >& rOrdering)
00068 {
00069     if (mOrderingHasBeenSpecified)
00070     {
00071         EXCEPTION("An ordering has already been specified.");
00072     }
00073     for (unsigned i=0; i<mMutationStates.size(); i++)
00074     {
00075         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellMutationState> >::const_iterator it
00076             = find(rOrdering.begin(), rOrdering.end(), mMutationStates[i]);
00077         if (it == rOrdering.end())
00078         {
00079             EXCEPTION("The given ordering doesn't include all mutation states in the registry.");
00080         }
00081     }
00082     mMutationStates = rOrdering;
00083 
00084     mOrderingHasBeenSpecified = true;
00085 }
00086 
00087 bool CellMutationStateRegistry::HasOrderingBeenSpecified()
00088 {
00089     return mOrderingHasBeenSpecified;
00090 }
